changelog:
The Friend Updates: 
 ---------------------------------------- 

 **1.** Changed the prefix to `*` , the old prefix (`!`) is no longer supported to avoid collision with other bots. 
 **2.** Added a `countdown` command. It takes hours as an input and calculates when the end of the countdown is, then messages the date. It messages everyone at the last 1 hour, 30 minutes and when the countdown ends. Type `*help` if you want to see how to use it.
 **3.** Added a typo checker. It returns a help message. 
 **4.** Added an `updates` command. It returns all changes made to the newer version.
